description:
Variation of Condition 54 (Energy Condition) of Planning permission ref: PP/2014/4426 dated 4th March 2015, for `Partial refurbishment, demotion and redevelopment of shopping centre to provide 4 storey residential accommodation fronting the burial ground and eastern 
 perimeter of the site, together with 4 storey residential accommodation above a reconfigured High Street mall entrance. Refurbishment of mall existing mall units, refurbishment and extension of two units to provide one 1,217 sqm class A1 retail unit and creation of new 533 
 sqm unit (A1/A2/A3/D2) above Belvedere Public House. Provision of 36 residential units, storage, plant, circulation space and amenity space, provision of 76 car parking spaces including 4 disabled spaces and 38 cycle parking spaces, with access from Churchfield Road. Provision of landscaped pedestrian link between the burial ground and High Street`.(Variation to enable submisison of revised energy report to demonstrate overall minimum reduction in CO2 emissions by 25% over Building Regulations 2010).
